message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $15000 to you. I would like to propose a price of $14000 for this exceptional item. I believe this is a fair offer considering its value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on this product, I'm not quite ready to go that high yet.  I'd be willing to pay $13000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To better align with your budget, I am now proposing a price of $13500 for the product. This still reflects its value to you while allowing us to reach an agreement.
